plot outline: A physically challenged boy is raised by his single mother, who helps him overcome his physical limitations and lead a normal life. The boy grows up to be a school teacher with a happy family, enjoying his life with his mother, wife, and daughter. However, he finds himself in a tight spot when he is faced with legal and emotional issues.
title: Ammana Mane
plot: A physically challenged boy is raised by his single mother, who helps him overcome his physical limitations and lead a normal life. The boy grows up to be a school teacher with a happy family, enjoying his life with his mother, wife, and daughter. However, he finds himself in a tight spot when he is faced with legal and emotional issues.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
